name: strava-statistics
description: Statistics for Strava is a self-hosted analytics dashboard for Strava athletes. It imports activities and displays advanced stats, charts, and trends.
features: Activity import: Syncs all activities from Strava account automatically.
Advanced statistics: Calculates detailed metrics beyond Strava's native analytics.
Gear tracking: Monitors equipment usage and mileage across activities.
Heatmaps: Visualizes activity routes on interactive maps.
Personal records: Tracks PRs for segments, distances, and elevation.
Yearly comparisons: Compares performance across different years and periods.
Challenge tracking: Monitors progress toward custom distance or time goals.
Eddington number: Calculates cycling and running Eddington numbers.
Activity trends: Displays trends in pace, heart rate, and power over time.
Export data: Downloads statistics and charts for external analysis.
Privacy focused: Processes data locally without sharing with third parties.
Responsive design: Views statistics on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
